item.title: Helping Hands, Saving Hands
item.description:
Helping Hands, Saving Hands by Elder Koichi Aoyagi, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 180th Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 2010
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Koichi Aoyagi, Of the Seventy

item.title: Hold on Thy Way
item.description:
Hold on Thy Way by Elder Koichi Aoyagi, Emeritus Member of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 185th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2015
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
